member.name: T:Prefill.PreFill
member.summary: PreFill, adds desired character or text on the left of value or list of values in order to align it/them to the right side.

member.name: M:Prefill.PreFill.GetNumberOfDigit(System.Int64)
member.summary: Calculates number of digit of a specified long number via using Math.Log10 methot. If number is negative it adds one more digit for minus sign. (Signed sbyte, short, int, long)
member.param: A number whose number of digit to be found.
member.returns: Digit number of speficied long number. If number is negative returns one additional digit for minus sign. If number is zero returns 1.

member.name: M:Prefill.PreFill.GetNumberOfDigit(System.Nullable{System.Int64})
member.summary: Calculates number of digit of a specified long number via using Math.Log10 method. If number is null returns 0. If number is negative it adds one more digit for minus sign. (Signed sbyte, short, int, long)
member.param: A number whose number of digit to be found.
member.returns: Digit number of speficied long number. If number is null returns 0. If number is negative returns one additional digit for minus sign. If number is zero returns 1.

member.name: M:Prefill.PreFill.GetNumberOfDigit(System.UInt64)
member.summary: Calculates number of digit of a specified unsigned long number via using Math.Log10 methot. (Unsigned byte, ushort, uint, ulong)
member.param: A number whose number of digit to be found.
member.returns: Digit number of speficied unsinged long number.

member.name: M:Prefill.PreFill.GetNumberOfDigit(System.Nullable{System.UInt64})
member.summary: Calculates number of digit of a specified unsigned long number via using Math.Log10 method. If number is null returns zero. (Unsigned byte, ushort, uint, ulong)
member.param: A number whose number of digit to be found.
member.returns: Digit number of speficied unsinged long number. If number is null returns 0.

member.name: M:Prefill.PreFill.GetLengthOfString(System.String)
member.summary: Calculates length of a specified text via using string.Length. (String)
member.param: A text whose length to be found.
member.returns: The number of characters of specified text. If text is null, it returns zero.

member.name: M:Prefill.PreFill.FillChar(System.Int32,System.Char)
member.summary: Creates a string value for prefilling value via repeating text with speficied count times.
member.param: Number of filling.
Selected character to fill.
member.returns: A string whose filled with specified char.

member.name: M:Prefill.PreFill.FillString(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a string value for prefilling value via repeating text with specified count times.
member.param: Number of filling string value.
Selected text to fill.
member.returns: A string whose filled with specified string.

member.name: M:Prefill.PreFill.PrefilledCustom(System.Int64,System.Byte,System.String)
member.summary: Calls PreFillCustom() method to create prefilling value with specified values (string) and concatenates it with number value itself at the end.
member.param: Number of filling.
Maximum number of digit including specified number and prefilling.
Selected text to fill before number.
member.returns: Concentration of prefilled by selected text with maximum digit set.

member.name: M:Prefill.PreFill.PrefilledCustom(System.Nullable{System.Int64},System.Byte,System.String)
member.summary: Calls PreFillCustom() method to create prefilling value with specified values (string) and concatenates it with number value itself at the end. If number is null, it returns only prefillling value.
member.param: Number of filling. If number is null, it returns prefilling value depends on maxNumberOfDigit.
Maximum number of digit including specified number and prefilling.
Selected text to fill before number.
member.returns: Concentration of prefilled by selected text with maximum digit set. If number is null, it returns only prefillling value.

member.name: M:Prefill.PreFill.PrefilledCustom(System.Int64,System.Byte,System.Char)
member.summary: Calls PreFillCustom() method to create prefilling value with specified values (char) and concatenates it with number value itself at the end.
member.param: Number of filling.
Maximum number of digit including specified number and prefilling.
Selected text to fill before number.
member.returns: Concentration of prefilled by selected text with maximum digit set.

member.name: M:Prefill.PreFill.PrefilledCustom(System.Nullable{System.Int64},System.Byte,System.Char)
member.summary: Calls PreFillCustom() method to create prefilling value with specified values (char) and concatenates it with number value itself at the end. If number is null, it returns only prefillling value.
member.param: Number of filling. If number is null, it returns prefilling value depends on maxNumberOfDigit.
Maximum number of digit including specified number and prefilling.
Selected text to fill before number.
member.returns: Concentration of prefilled by selected text with maximum digit set. If number is null, it returns only prefillling value.

member.name: M:Prefill.PreFill.PrefilledCustom(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Int64},System.String)
member.summary: Checks if provided list is null or empty if not finds longest length and calls PreFillCustom() method to create prefilling value for each element. Creates a list of concatenated prefilling value (string) and number value itself via using longest length as maximum length.
member.param: List of specified numbers.
Selected text to fill before numbers.
member.returns: Concentration of prefilled list of string and number itself.

member.name: M:Prefill.PreFill.PrefilledCustom(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Nullable{System.Int64}},System.String)
member.summary: Checks if provided list is null or empty if not finds longest length and calls PreFillCustom() method to create prefilling value for each element. Creates a list of concatenated prefilling value (string) and number value itself via using longest length as maximum length.
member.param: List of specified numbers.
Selected text to fill before numbers.
member.returns: Concentration of prefilled list of string and number itself. If element is null, adds only prefilling value into list.

member.name: M:Prefill.PreFill.PrefilledCustom(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Int64},System.Char)
member.summary: Checks if provided list is null or empty if not finds longest length and calls PreFillCustom() method to create prefilling value for each element. Creates a list of concatenated prefilling value (char) and number value itself via using longest length as maximum length.
member.param: List of specified numbers.

member.name: M:Prefill.PreFill.PreFillCustom(System.Int64,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Calculates number of digit of given number then creates string for prefilling value of specified text before given number on limit of maximum number of digit.
member.param: A number whose prefill value to be found.
Maximum number of digit including specified number and prefilling.
Specified text whose will be used for prefilling.
member.returns: Returns prefill value for a specified number.

member.name: M:Prefill.PreFill.PreFillCustom(System.Nullable{System.Int64},System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Calculates number of digit of given number then creates string for prefilling value of specified text before given number on limit of maximum number of digit.
member.param: A number whose prefill value to be found.
Maximum number of digit including specified number and prefilling.
Specified text whose will be used for prefilling.
member.returns: Returns prefill value for a specified number. If number is null, it returns prefilling value depends on maxNumberOfDigit.
